channel.title: PortShuttle Rotterdam | LinkedIn
channel.description: PortShuttle Rotterdam | 236 followers on LinkedIn. Container exchange by rail. | PortShuttle Rotterdam offers its customers an extensive network for the exchange of containers between terminals in the port of Rotterdam. By using the existing network of rail providers in Rotterdam we interconnect the deepsea container terminals located on the Maasvlakte. Through the Rail Service Center and CTT-R we connect the Waal-/Eemhaven area and the Maasvlakte.

item.title: Let's meet: Frank Heins! My name is Frank, and Iâ€™ve been part of PortShuttle for over four years, where Iâ€™m able to pursue my pass...
item.description: Let's meet: Frank Heins! My name is Frank, and Iâ€™ve been part of PortShuttle for over four years, where Iâ€™m able to pursue my passion for railway transportation every day. In my team, we are dedicated to continuously optimizing operational processes and developing IT tools that help to deliver the highest quality and flexibility to our customers. Thanks to PortShuttleâ€™s unique position as a neutral organization, I have the opportunity to collaborate with various parties involved in creating the rail product Rotterdam has to offer. Over the years, weâ€™ve made significant progress and gained valuable insights through collaboration and open communication. Iâ€™m excited and committed to continuing this journey, enhancing efficiency, and facilitating the growth of the rail product in Rotterdam. #PortShuttleRotterdam #MeetTheTeam
item.dc:creator: PortShuttle Rotterdam

item.title: Think you know everything about PortShuttle Rotterdam? Here are some fun and surprising facts about how we keep Europe's busiest p...
item.description: Think you know everything about PortShuttle Rotterdam? Here are some fun and surprising facts about how we keep Europe's busiest port moving: 1. Pioneers in Port Logistics - we're the first neutral rail service within the port of Rotterdam 2. Bridging the gap - we connect over 7 terminals within the port of Rotterdam by rail, ensuring efficient transport and seamless logistics 3. Round the clock operations - our Virtual PortShuttle system run whole year round, ensuring smooth container exchange no matter the season 4. Precision timing - every week, we follow a carefully synchronized schedule to connect terminals with unmatched efficiency 5. Always growing - with increasing demand of sustainable logistics, we're expanding routes and services to keep up with the pace of the supply chain #PortShuttleRotterdam #RailTransport #portofRotterdam
item.dc:creator: PortShuttle Rotterdam

item.title: PortShuttle Rotterdam is a 100% subsidiary of Port of Rotterdam. We're a neutral player in the logistics chain, dedicated to makin...
item.description: PortShuttle Rotterdam is a 100% subsidiary of Port of Rotterdam. We're a neutral player in the logistics chain, dedicated to making the intermodal rail product of the port of Rotterdam the best it can be! Together with our partners we are working on an excellent rail product. Curious to learn more? Find out who we are: https://lnkd.in/e2-dWGjK #PortShuttleRotterdam #PortofRotterdam
